section:
Server Class Reference Server Collaboration diagram for Server:
Public Member Functions
void initialize ()
The function class the method Server.initializeUseServerCFG(), which parse 'docs/server.cfg'. Then it declare and preinitialize some vars. Then the method declare datastructures like FileHandler.
void initializeUseServerCFG (String[] cfStrings)
This function become called by Server.initialize(). Then the function will parse 'docs/server.cfg' with calling FileHandler. Then the called FileHandler method will return a array of rooms, or users, or messages to this function. Than this function will safe the data in the array of rooms, users, or messages. This function initialise data like position and size too. Parsed data: rooms, users, directChats, directMessage, Message, frameTitle, frameHeigth, frameWidth, frameX, frameY, frameMenuBarItem, frameMenuBarItem_QUIT, adress, framePanelRoomsHeigth, framePanelRoomsWidth, framePanelLogsHeigth, framePanelLogsHeigth, framePanelUsersHeigth, framePanelUsersWidth.
void run ()
This function starts the two threads, which are safed in Server.serverGUI and in Server.serverConntenctionListener.
void connectionListener ()
This function contains a thread. This thread waits in the try-catch block for the server socket to be accepted by establishing a connection. The connection is stored in a temporary socket. The login process with the client takes place via this thread. Than the function calls the method Server.getUserIdentity(). The called method returns the index of the account. Than the socket of the user with the index become copied into the user-socket. Than the client will communicate with an Instance of the type User.
int getUserIdentity (String username, String password)
This function traverses the stored accounts (users). The method User.checkIdendity() is always used to check whether the login data is stored. If yes, the index of the account is returned. If not, a new account is created and the index of the new account is returned.

void serverAddMessage (Message message, int room)
This server adds a message into a room.
void serverAddRoom (Room room)
This server adds a new Room to the server.
void serverAddUser (User user, String password)
This method adds a new User-Account to the server.
int serverGetNewRoomIdx ()
This method gets the highest index of the rooms. Than the highest index incremented by 1 become the index for a new room.
void serverAppendToFile (int mode, String content)
This method class MyFileHandler.appendToFile() to append an entry into a file.
void serverDelRoom (int idx)
This method removes a romm from the class var. Than the method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called. This deletes the entry with the selected room.
void serverEdtRoom (int idx, String content1, String content2)
This method edit an existing room. The data of one room become reinitialised. The method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called.
void serverAddLog (int user, String content)
This method.
void serverAddDirectChatMessage (int idx, int idx1, int idx2, String content)
This adds a direct-chat-message into Server.directsChats and calls MyFileHandler.serverAppendToFile().
void serverAddDirectChat (String title, int idx, int idxU)
This method adds a new Direct-Chat to Server.directChats and calls MyFileHandler.serverAppendToFile().
void serverUserVerwarnen (int idx)
This method warns a user. The method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called.
void serverUserVerwarnen (int idx, String content)
This method warns a user. The method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called.
void serverUserKick (int idx)
This method kicks a user from the server. The Method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called.
void serverUserBan (int idx)
This server bans a user. The method MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() become called.

Author
Staacke, Felix
Todo
do not spawn a own Frame. Repaint the Server Main Frame. Show the dialog instead of the dashboard.
Parameters
idx
} else { content.add(new JLabel( "Bisher kein Direktchat eröffnet. Klicke Knopf im neuen Chat zu öffnen!"));
JButton button = new JButton("Neuer Direktchat"); button.addActionListener(new ActionListener() { @Override public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { serverAddDirectChat("Server" + users.get(idx).getUsername(), directChats.size(), idx); } });
Füge den Button zum content Panel hinzu content.add(button); }
